Not to Trifle With Hearts.--To trifle with hearts is a crime of no small magnitude in the sight of a holy God. And yet some will show preference for young ladies and call out their affections, and then go their way and forget 

300 

all about the words they have spoken and their effect. A new face attracts them, and they repeat the same words, devote to another the same attentions.--RH, Nov 4, 1884. (AH 57.)
